title: Hearing
context: ยง334-83 Hearing. The court may take testimony and may examine the patient and after a full and complete hearing shall render a decision in writing, setting forth its findings of fact and conclusions of law. The court may award a fee to the guardian ad litem to be paid out of any property of the patient or funds of the court available therefor. [L 1967, c 259, pt of ยง3; HRS ยง334-83; am L 1973, c 93, pt of ยง2]
